div.p: SICILY, a large island in the Mediterranean Sea, adjoining to the southern extremity of Italy, and extending from latitude 36째 25' to latitude 38째 25', and from longitude 12째 50' to longitude 15째 40' east from London. Its greatest length is 210 miles, its breadth 133, its circumference 600. For a description of the island, see Naples.
